text: Dramarama is an alternative rock band. It may also refer to: * Dramarama (TV series), a 1980s British television series * Dramarama (film), a 2001 Icelandic anthology film * Dramarama (film), a 2006 film that was to star Lindsay Lohan but was unreleased * Total DramaRama, a Canadian/American animated television series
title: Dramarama (disambiguation)
